projects.name: Echonet Dynamics MLCARE
projects.description: Developed a lung cancer prediction system using Random Forest for early detection. Integrated a Python-based GUI for a user-friendly clinical decision support interface.

projects.name: C.L.A.V.E - Smart India hackathon 2025
projects.description: Designed a deep learning model combining CNN and GRU to classify Micro-Doppler signals. Extracted and analyzed spatial and temporal features to improve accuracy.

candidate_fit_summary: The candidate is an aspiring data scientist with expertise in machine learning and AI, but lacks the required medical degree and clinical experience for the General Physician role.
fit_score_reason: The candidate does not meet the mandatory requirements of an MBBS degree or equivalent medical degree and lacks the necessary clinical experience in general practice.
